participant_1.background:
I enjoy this type of activist work , as my job isn t very personally fulfilling.
I enjoying keeping up with the news and learning about political issues.
I often spend my free time engaging in activism work with friends and family.
I also enjoy reading novels by female authors and exploring new areas.

participant_2.background:
I sing in the church choir every sunday.
I favorite brand of clothing is donna karen.
I am an middle school teacher for 8th grade.
I love to go to the symphony orchestra.

content.text: Hello! How are you?
I'm well, thank you!
That's good to hear. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to sing in the church choir, go to the symphony orchestra, and read novels by female authors.
Oh, that sounds fun! I also like to read novels by female authors. Do you have any favorite authors?
I love Toni Morrison, Alice Walker, and Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie.
I've heard of Toni Morrison, but I'm not familiar with the other two. I'll have to check them out.
I highly recommend them! They're all amazing writers.
Thanks for the recommendation! What do you like about singing in the church choir?
I love the sense of community and the beauty of the music.
I can imagine! I've always wanted to join a church choir, but I've never had the time.
You should definitely try it sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I might just do that! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem!
I'm also an activist, but my job isn't very personally fulfilling. Do you do any activism work?
I do! I often volunteer at my local soup kitchen and I'm a member of the American Civil Liberties Union.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that you're so involved in your community.
Thanks! I think it's important to make a difference in the world.
I agree! I think you're doing great work.
Thanks! I appreciate it.
It was nice talking to you!
You too!
